BandMathX|out
This application performs mathematical operations on several multiband images.
Image Manipulation
QgsProcessingParameterMultipleLayers|il|Input image list|3|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|out|Output Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterString|exp|Expressions|None|False|False
QgsProcessingParameterFile|incontext|Import context|QgsProcessingParameterFile.File|None|None|True
QgsProcessingParameterFileDestination|outcontext|Export context|None|None|True
*QgsProcessingParameterEnum|outputpixeltype|Output pixel type|uint8;int;float;double|False|2|True
